reviewText: My son is 6 years old and loves this movie!  We just got it and he has already watched it twice.  He loves answering the riddle questions.  He also loves to play the games on riddlebug.com.

This DVD is great!  The animation and the Riddlebug and Detective Slug characters are really cute and the kids love watching them! The interactive aspect of the DVD really keeps the kids engaged and focused - plus they're really learning something at the same time.  I would highly recommend this DVD to anyone who wants a fun learning experience for kids!

I bought this for several friends' children. Both the parents and the kids love this DVD.  What makes it so wonderful is the interactive nature of it- the kids never tire of it and they're always learning.  I have watched it with the kids too and it's great to see them so involved and having fun.

I buy my kids so many DVDs. They watch them once and then they're done. Riddlebug is not only educational but it's interactive. My daughter loves watching it over an over because it changes every time. I would recommend this as a gift and can't wait until the next one in the series comes out!

I have two girls, 4 and 2 years old.  They love this animated cartoon. The characters are easy to like and understand.  They can interact along with the video and learn at the same time.  We watch it over and over.  I highly reccommend The Adventures of RiddleBug and Detective Slug.
This was a lot of fun. It's an interactive cartoon that allows kids to get involved in the show. They will have a great time while learning.
